alert.note: Alert for Houston; Wabasha; Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 08 at 4:05AM CST until December 09 at 3:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 3 PM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Wintry mix possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Minnesota and southwest Wisconsin. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 3 PM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Friday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation types might change from time to time as this weather system moves through. Watch for changing road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
